rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Adjacent cells with digits summing to 5 are marked by V. Adjacent cells with digits summing to 10 are marked by X. All possible V and X are marked.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Adjacent cells with digits summing to 5 are marked by V. Adjacent cells with digits summing to 10 are marked by X. All possible V and X are marked.
